How to recognize: no background noise or ambient sounds
keyboard typing, paper shuffling, or distant conversations
chirping birds, rustling leaves, or distant waves at a beach
doors opening and closing, footsteps, or kitchen noises
people talking, dishes clattering, announcements, or crowd activity
computer fan noise, microphone feedback, or occasional glitches and distortions
doorbells, pets, alarms, phone ringtone, loud music
